remarks: Closure of the group multiple (exponentiation) operation in a subsemigroup.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 10-Jan-2015.)
statement:
mulgnnsubcl.b $e |- B = ( Base ` G ) $.
mulgnnsubcl.t $e |- .x. = ( .g ` G ) $.
mulgnnsubcl.p $e |- .+ = ( +g ` G ) $.
mulgnnsubcl.g $e |- ( ph -> G e. V ) $.
mulgnnsubcl.s $e |- ( ph -> S C_ B ) $.
mulgnnsubcl.c $e |- ( ( ph /\ x e. S /\ y e. S ) -> ( x .+ y ) e. S ) $.
mulgnnsubcl $p |- ( ( ph /\ N e. NN /\ X e. S ) -> ( N .x. X ) e. S ) $.
$d .+ x y $.
$d .x. x $.
$d B x y $.
$d G x y $.
$d N x y $.
$d S x y $.
$d X x y $.
$d ph x y $.
